data.text: @nzherald Welcome to Labours neosocialism. Let some people rip off the government and tax the shit out of everyone else. $3 a litre petrol is half govt tax. How hard is it to reduce tax until oil prices drop...or do they want everyone to buy an $80000 EV with all their disposable income?
@nzherald The top management of @KaingaOraGovtNZ needs to be sacked immediately and deported to Russia
